verbose_text: Schmidt et al. have reported that Vpu inhibited both the anterograde transport of newly synthesized tetherin / BST-2 and the recycling of tetherin / BST-2 to the cell surface and trapped trafficking tetherin / BST-2 molecules at the TGN.
evidence: Vpu inhibited both the anterograde transport of newly synthesized tetherin/BST-2
